message: I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product for $1200000. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll find extremely valuable.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of this product, $1200000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $1100000 for it. Let me know if you're open to that price.

I appreciate your willingness to make an offer, Bob. However, I'm not quite ready to meet you at $1100000. I'm willing to consider a price of $1150000. This is a fair compromise that still reflects the product's value to you.
